nodes.text: Gir Endac was a Human male from the planet Mexeluine who served in the Bespin Wing Guard during the Galactic Civil War. He was present with fellow Wing Guardsmen in Cloud City just prior to the Occupation of Bespin in 3 ABY. Endac, alongside fellow Wing Guardsmen Corman Jeihn, Pedar Solardo, Helder Spinoza, Bialar Selis, and Razell Tameron, proceeded to ambush an Imperial unit led by Lieutenant Sheckil while they were transporting Princess Leia Organa, Chewbacca, and C-3PO to Vader's shuttle, having been secretly notified by Calrissian via Lobot.
At one point in time, Endac helped the accountant Samara Kebyc track down corrupt officials within the Cloud City Miner's Guild. While on duty, he carried a blaster pistol, baton and MagnaCuffs.

This originally unnamed character first appeared in 1980's Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back. He received his own action figure in 2001, though the character photo on the package was heavily modified to better match the figure.
